title: I downloaded Android 11 and it's been a horrible experience so far. It's filled with bugs & glitches
content: Before I installed Android 11, my phone was running smoothly. Still felt like it was brand new and I had 0 complains. After I installed the update? It's been a pain to use. There's bugs and glitches that keep annoying me and I just want to roll back to the previous version.
